lenya:meta.dc:title: DC Title
lenya:meta.dc:creator: Christian Egli
lenya:meta.dc:subject: DC Subject
lenya:meta.dc:description: Abstract that can be used on an overview page

body.p:
The default publication comes with the XHTML Doctype.
The XHTML Doctype is for situations where users ask for complete freedom on what information can be inserted into a document. While this approach doesn't restrict you, it also looses some of the major benefits of well defined document types.
